explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a law risk prediction model based on machine learning techniques.
explanations.deep learning: The WBIF model is described as a deep learning model integrating BiLSTM and FCN.
explanations.neural network: The model uses neural network architectures (BiLSTM and FCN).
explanations.long short-term memory: The model employs Bidirectional Long Short-Term Memory (BiLSTM).
explanations.LSTM: BiLSTM is a variant of LSTM used in the proposed model.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The model includes Fully Convolutional Networks (FCN), which are related to CNNs.
explanations.CNN: FCN is a type of CNN architecture used in the model.
